body.name: Xabitat Luxury Cordless Iron | 1500W Steam Iron | Anti Drip | Thermal Protection Technology | Nonstick Ceramic Soleplate | 2-in-1 Cord/Cordless | Adjustable & Vertical Steam Controller | Auto Shut-Off
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 39 mins
features: GARMENT PROTECT PLUS TECHNOLOGY - Safeguard your fabrics with advanced thermal protection soleplate, ensuring your clothes remain pristine while delivering powerful steam performance
POWERFUL WRINKLE REMOVAL - Dominate wrinkles effortlessly with our precision steam control, tailored for every fabric. Say goodbye to stubborn creases and hello to flawlessly ironed garments

LUXURIOUSLY LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN - Crafted from aerospace-grade alloy, our cordless clothing iron combines durability with feather-light ease. Glide through your ironing with the grace of a pro, without the fatigue

ULTRA-FAST HEATING TECHNOLOGY - Ready to roll in seconds, our clothes iron puts time back in your hands. Achieve professional results swiftly and efficiently, no more waiting around for your iron to warm up
ANTI-DRIP PRECISION - Our advanced anti-leak system ensures a mess-free ironing experience. Enjoy the power of precision steam without the worry of water stains on your favourite garments
SMART SAFETY INTEGRATION - Unmatched safety features including automatic shut-off for worry-free ironing sessions. Your safety is our priority, giving you peace of mind with every press
ELEGANTLY SLEEK PROFILE - Make a statement with our modern finish. Not just an iron, it’s a style statement for your laundry room. Elevate the aesthetics of your ironing experience
body.description: Xabitat cordless steaming iron is perfect for quick and easy ironing. The Xabitat iron has a garment protect plus technology that can help to protect your garments from thermal damage keeping your clothes pristine for longer. Clothing Iron has a 1500W quick heating element that heats up in just 2 seconds, and a ceramic soleplate that glides smoothly over your garments. The steam iron also has a 3-way auto shutoff function that turns the iron off automatically if it is left unattended for too long, or if the temperature is too high. The iron also has a built-in water tank that can hold up to 15 fl oz of water, which can be used for steam bursts. The iron also has a 6 feet cord length, making it easy to reach all of your garments. The iron also has a vertical steaming function that can help to remove wrinkles from garments. The iron also has a self-cleaning function that can help to keep the iron clean and free from dirt and dust. The iron also has a micro chip inbuid thermo controller that can help to ensure that the iron is heated evenly and that the temperature is controlled accurately. The iron also has a pre-tested function that can help to ensure that the iron is working properly before you use it.
